# `explore regex` for [viewers](/commands/categories/viewers.md)

<div class='command-title'>Launch a TUI to create and explore regular expressions interactively.</div>

## Signature

```> explore regex {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | string |
| string  | string |
## Examples

Explore a regular expression interactively
```nu
> explore regex

```

Explore a regular expression interactively with sample text
```nu
> open -r Cargo.toml | explore regex

```

## Notes
Press `Ctrl-Q` to quit and provide constructed regular expression as the output.
